name: DEAD BATTERIES (Santo Padre)
description:
Video Game made for the Ludum Dare 46.

The goal of the game is to get out from a pyramid, collect Batteries for a Flash light that will lighten your path, and steal some egyptian's treasure...

TEAM : 
Music & sound design by GAETAN BOULAIN & EDGARD CHENET Developement & Game Design by FLORIAN RIVAULT Graphic Desgin & 3d Models by DAVID MARTINEZ
